`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function debounce(func, delay = 50) {
    let timer = null
    return function (...params) {
        timer && clearTimeout(timer)
        timer = setTimeout(() => func.apply(this, params), delay)
    }
}

//\u9632\u6296(\u5408\u5E76\u7248)
function debounce_merge(fn,wait = 500,isImmediate = false){
  var timerId = null;
  var flag = true;
  return function(){
    var context = this
    var args = arguments
    clearTimeout(timerId);

    if(isImmediate){
        if(flag){
            fn.apply(context,args)
            flag = false
        }
        timerId = setTimeout(function(){
            flag = true
        },wait)
    }else{
        timerId = setTimeout(function(){
            fn.apply(context,args)
        },wait)
    }
  }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function throttle(fn, delay) {
  let task = null;
  return function () {
    if (!task) {
      task = setTimeout(() => {
        task = null;
        fn.apply(this, arguments);
      }, delay);
    }
  };
}

  return JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(obj));

function deepCopy(obj) {
  if(obj === null || typeof obj !== 'object'){
      return obj;
  }
	
  let newObj = Array.isArray() ? [] : {};
  
  for (let item in obj) {
    if (obj.hasOwnPropertype(item)) {
      newObj[item] = deepCopy(obj[item]);
    }
  }
  return newObj;
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const tagMap = {
  mapTag: "[object Map]",
  setTag: "[object Set]",
  arrayTag: "[object Array]",
  objectTag: "[object Object]",
  symbolTag: "[object Symbol]",
  regexpTag: "[object RegExp]",
};

const checkType = (target) => {
  return Object.prototype.toString.call(target);
};

const checkTemp = (target) => {
  const c = target.constructor;
  return new c();
};

const cloneSymbol = (target) => {
  return Object(Symbol.prototype.valueOf.call(target));
};

const cloneReg = (target) => {
  const reFlags = /\\w*$/;
  const result = new target.constructor(target.source, reFlags.exec(target));
  result.lastIndex = target.lastIndex;
  return result;
};

const deepClone = (target, map = new Map()) => {
  const type = checkType(target);

  if (!Object.values(tagMap).includes(type)) {
    return target;
  }

  if (type === tagMap.symbolTag) {
    return cloneSymbol(target);
  }
  if (type === tagMap.regexpTag) {
    return cloneReg(target);
  }

  const temp = checkTemp(target);

  if (map.get(target)) {
    return map.get(target);
  }

  map.set(target, temp);

  if (type === tagMap.setTag) {
    target.forEach((value) => {
      temp.add(deepClone(value, map));
    });
  }

  if (type === tagMap.mapTag) {
    target.forEach((value, key) => {
      temp.set(key, deepClone(value, map));
    });
  }

  for (const key in target) {
    temp[key] = deepClone(target[key], map);
  }
  return temp;
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`class EventEmitter {
  constructor() {
    this.cache = [];
  }

  on(name, fn) {
    const tasks = this.cache[name];
    if (tasks) {
      tasks.push(fn);
    } else {
      this.cache[name] = [fn];
    }
  }

  off(name, fn) {
    if (!name) {
      this.cache = [];
      return;
    }
    const tasks = this.cache[name];
    if (tasks) {
      if (!fn) {
        this.cache[name] = [];
      }
      const index = tasks.findIndex((item) => item === fn);
      if (index >= 0) {
        tasks.splice(index, 1);
      }
    }
  }

  emit(name, ...args) {
    // \u590D\u5236\u4E00\u4EFD\u3002\u9632\u6B62\u56DE\u8C03\u91CC\u7EE7\u7EEDon\uFF0C\u5BFC\u81F4\u6B7B\u5FAA\u73AF
    const tasks = this.cache[name].slice();
    if (tasks) {
      for (let task of tasks) {
        task(...args);
      }
    }
  }

  once(name, cb) {
    const fn = (...args) => {
      cb(...args);
      this.off(name, fn);
    };
    this.on(name, fn);
  }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`// \u65B9\u6CD51
const shuffle = (arr) => {
  return arr.sort(() => {
    return Math.random() > 0.5 ? 1 : -1;
  });
};

// \u65B9\u6CD52
const shuffle = (arr) => {
  let i = arr.length;
  while (i) {
    let j = (Math.floor(Math.random() * i--)[(arr[j], arr[i])] = [
      arr[i],
      arr[j],
    ]);
  }
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`// \u65B9\u6CD51
const quchong = (arr) => {
  return [...new Set(arr)];
};

// \u65B9\u6CD52
const quchong = (arr) => {
  const res = [];
  arr.reduce((pre, next) => {
    if (!pre.has(next)) {
      pre.set(next, 1);
      res.push(next);
    }
    return pre;
  }, new Map());

  return res;
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function mySetInterval(fn, delay, times) {
  times--;
  if (!times) {
    clearTimeout();
    return;
  }

  let timer = setTimeout(() => {
    fn();
    mySetInterval(fn, delay, times);
  }, delay);
}
function fn() {
  console.log("1");
}
mySetInterval(fn, 1000, 10);

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function fn1(x) {
  return x + 1;
}

function fn2(x) {
  return x + 2;
}

function fn3(x) {
  return x + 3;
}

function fn4(x) {
  return x + 4;
}
const compose = (...fns) => {
  if (fns.length === 0) return (num) => num;
  if (fns.length === 1) return fns[0];
  return fns.reduce((pre, next) => {
    return (num) => {
      return pre(next(num));
    };
  });
};
const a = compose(fn1, fn2, fn3, fn4);
console.log(a(1)); // 1+2+3+4=11

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const add = (a, b, c) => a + b + c;
const currying = (fn, ...args) => {
  let allArgs = [...args];
  const num = fn.length;
  const res = (...args2) => {
    allArgs = [...allArgs, ...args2];
    if (allArgs.length === num) {
      return fn(...allArgs);
    } else {
      return res;
    }
  };
  return res;
};
const a = currying(add, 1);
console.log(a(2)(3)); // 1 + 2 + 3=6

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`class LRUCache {
  constructor(size) {
    this.size = size;
    this.cache = new Map();
  }
  get(key) {
    const hasKey = this.cache.has(key);
    if (!hasKey) {
      return -1;
    } else {
      const val = this.cache.get(key);
      this.cache.delete(key);
      this.cache.set(key, val);
      return val;
    }
  }
  put(key, value) {
    const hasKey = this.cache.has(key);
    if (hasKey) {
      this.cache.delete(key);
    }
    this.cache.set(key, value);
    if (this.cache.size > this.size) {
	  // \u6309\u63D2\u5165\u987A\u5E8F\u6392\u5217
      this.cache.delete(this.cache.keys().next().value);
    }
  }
}

  obj.tag = node.tagName;

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function _render(vnode) {
  if (typeof vnode === "number") {
    vnode = String(vnode);
  }

  if (typeof vnode === "string") {
    return document.createTextNode(vnode);
  }

  const dom = document.createElement(vnode.tag);
  if (vnode.attrs) {
    Object.keys(attrs).forEach((key) => {
      const attr = artts[key];
      dom.setAttribute(key, attr);
    });
  }
  vnode.children.forEach((child) => dom.appenChild(_render(child)));

  return dom;
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const cycleDetector = (obj) => {
  const arr = [obj];
  let flag = false;

  const cycle = (o) => {
    const values = Object.values(o);
    for (let value of values) {
      if (typeof value === "object" && value !== null) {
        if (arr.includes(value)) {
          flag = true;
          return;
        }
        arr.push(value);
        cycle(value);
      }
    }
  };

  cycle(obj);

  return flag;
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const loopGetLevel = (obj) => {
  let num = 1;

  const computed = (obj, level) => {
    level = level || 0;
    if (typeof obj === "object" && obj !== null) {
      Object.values(obj).forEach((v) => {
        if (typeof v === "object" && v !== null) {
          computed(v, level + 1);
        } else {
          num = level + 1 > num ? level + 1 : num;
        }
      });
    } else {
      num = level > num ? level : num;
    }
  };
  computed(obj);

  return num;
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const flatten = (obj) => {
  if (!isObject(obj)) return;
  const res = {};
  const dfs = (cur, prefix) => {
    if (isObject(cur)) {
      if (Array.isArray(cur)) {
        for (let i in cur) {
          dfs(cur[i], \`\${prefix}[\${i}]\`);
        }
      } else {
        for (let i in cur) {
          dfs(cur[i], \`\${prefix}\${prefix ? "." : ""}\${i}\`);
        }
      }
    } else {
      res[prefix] = cur;
    }
  };
  dfs(obj, "");

  return res;
};

Eat dinner~

LazyMan(\u201CHank\u201D).eat(\u201Cdinner\u201D).eat(\u201Csupper\u201D)\u8F93\u51FA

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`class _lazyMan {
  constructor(name) {
    const fn = () => {
      console.log(\`Hi! This is \${name}\`);
      this.next();
    };
    this.tasks = [];
    this.tasks.push(fn);
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.next();
    });
  }
  next() {
    const task = this.tasks.shift();
    task && task();
  }
  sleep(delay) {
    this.sleepWrapper(delay);
    return this;
  }
  sleepFirst(delay) {
    this.sleepWrapper(delay, true);
    return this;
  }
  sleepWrapper(time, first) {
    const fn = () => {
      setTimeout(() => {
        console.log(\`Wake up after \${time}\`);
        this.next();
      }, time * 1000);
    };
    if (first) {
      this.tasks.unshift(fn);
    } else {
      this.tasks.push(fn);
    }
  }
  eat(food) {
    const fn = () => {
      console.log(\`Eat \${food}\`);
      this.next();
    };
    this.tasks.push(fn);
    return this;
  }
}

const LazyMan = (name) => {
  return new _lazyMan(name);
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.h3,{id:"22\u5B9E\u73B0\u539F\u751F-ajax-\u5C01\u88C5",children:[(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.a,{className:"header-anchor",href:"#22\u5B9E\u73B0\u539F\u751F-ajax-\u5C01\u88C5",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.span,{className:"icon icon-link"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/fontEnd/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-26047638-d52d-425d-9846-ffa0a0fc6404.mdx"},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/fontEnd/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-26047638-d52d-425d-9846-ffa0a0fc6404.mdx"},this),"22\u3001\u5B9E\u73B0\u539F\u751F AJAX \u5C01\u88C5"]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/fontEnd/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-26047638-d52d-425d-9846-ffa0a0fc6404.mdx",lineNumber:689,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const ajax = {
  get(url, fn) {
    // \u521B\u5EFA xhr \u5BF9\u8C61
    const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    // method:\u8981\u662F\u7528\u7684HTTP\u65B9\u6CD5\uFF0Curl\uFF1A\u8BF7\u6C42\u7684\u4E3B\u4F53\uFF0Casync(\u53EF\u9009)\uFF1Afalse\u4E3A\u540C\u6B65\uFF0Ctrue\u4E3A\u5F02\u6B65\uFF0C\u9ED8\u8BA4\u4E3A\u540C\u6B65
    xhr.open("GET", url, true);
    // \u53EA\u8981 readyState \u5C5E\u6027\u53D1\u751F\u53D8\u5316\uFF0C\u5C31\u4F1A\u8C03\u7528\u76F8\u5E94\u7684\u5904\u7406\u51FD\u6570\u3002
    xhr.onreadystatechange = function () {
      if (xhr.readyState === 4) {
        if (xhr.status === 200) {
          // \u4ECE\u670D\u52A1\u5668\u7AEF\u8FD4\u56DE\u6587\u672C\u3002
          fn(xhr.responseText);
        }
      }
    };
    xhr.send();
  },
  post(url, fn, data) {
    const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.open("POST", url, true);
    xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");
    xhr.onreadystatechange = function () {
      if (xhr.readyState === 4) {
        if (xhr.status === 200) {
          // \u4ECE\u670D\u52A1\u5668\u7AEF\u8FD4\u56DE\u6587\u672C\u3002
          fn(xhr.responseText);
        }
      }
    };
    xhr.send(data);
  },
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`let str = "0123456789";
let temp = "";
// \u5148\u505A\u4E00\u4E2A 10KB \u7684\u5B57\u7B26\u4E32
while (str.length !== 10240) {
  str = str + "0123456789";
}

// \u5148\u6E05\u7A7A
localStorage.clear();

const computedTotal = () => {
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    // \u4E0D\u65AD\u5F80 LocalStorage \u4E2D\u7D2F\u79EF\u5B58\u50A8 10KB
    const timer = setInterval(() => {
      try {
        localStorage.setItem("temp", temp);
      } catch {
        // \u62A5\u9519\u8BF4\u660E\u8D85\u51FA\u6700\u5927\u5B58\u50A8
        resolve(temp.length / 1024 - 10);
        clearInterval(timer);
        // \u7EDF\u8BA1\u5B8C\u8BB0\u5F97\u6E05\u7A7A
        localStorage.clear();
      }
      temp += str;
    }, 0);
  });
};

(async () => {
  const total = await computedTotal();
  console.log(\`\u6700\u5927\u5BB9\u91CF\${total}KB\`);
})();

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const toAsync = (fn) => {
  return function () {
    const gen = fn.apply(this.arguments);

    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      function go(key, arg) {
        let res;
        try {
          res = gen[key](arg);
        } catch (e) {
          return reject(e);
        }

        const { value, done } = res;
        if (done) {
          return resolve(value);
        } else {
          return Promise.resolve(value)
            .then((val) => {
              go("next", val);
            })
            .catch((err) => {
              go("throw", err);
            });
        }
      }
      go("next");
    });
  };
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`Promise.sx_all = (promises) => {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    const result = [];
    let count = 0;
    for (let i = 0; i < promises.length; i++) {
      const promise = Promise.resolve(promises[i]);
      promise
        .then((res) => {
          result[i] = res;
          count++;
          if (count === promises.length) {
            resolve(result);
          }
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          reject(err);
        });
    }
  });
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`Promise.sx_race = (promises) => {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    for (let i = 0; i < promises.length; i++) {
      const promise = Promise.resolve(promises[i]);
      promise
        .then((res) => {
          resolve(res);
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          reject(err);
        });
    }
  });
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`Promise.sx_allSettled = (promises) => {
    return new Promise((resolve) => {
        const result = []
        let count = 0
        const addData = (status, value, i) => {
            result[i] = {
                status,
                value
            }
            count++
            if (count === promises.length) {
                resolve(result)
            }
        }
        for (let i = 0; i < promises.length; i++) {
            const promise = Promise.resolve(promises[i])
            promise.then(res => {
                addData('fulfilled', res, i)
            }).catch(err => {
                addData('rejected', err, i)
            })
        }
    })
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`Promise.sx_any = (promises) => {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        let count = 0
        for (let i = 0; i < promises.length; i++) {
            const promise = Promise.resolve(promises[i])
            promise.then(res => {
                resolve(res)
            }).catch(err => {
                count++
                if (count === promises.length) {
                    reject('\u5168\u9519\uFF01\uFF01\uFF01')
                }
            })
        }
    })
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`class Scheduler {
  constructor(limit) {
    this.limit = limit;
    this.running = 0;
    this.queue = [];
  }

  addTask(duration, id) {
    const task = () => {
      return new Promise((resolve) => {
        setTimeout(() => {
          console.log(id);
          resolve();
        }, duration);
      });
    };

    this.queue.push(task);

    this.schedule();
  }

  schedule() {
    if (this.queue.length === 0 || this.running >= this.limit) {
      return;
    }

    this.running++;
    const task = this.queue.shift();

    task().then(() => {
      this.running--;
      this.schedule();
    });
  }
}

const scheduler = new Scheduler(2);

scheduler.addTask(1000, "1");
scheduler.addTask(500, "2");
scheduler.addTask(300, "3");

  obj = obj || window;
  const fn = Symbol();
  obj[fn] = this;
  const res = obj[fn](...args);
  delete obj[fn];
  return res;
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`Function.prototype.my_bind = function (obj, ...args) {
  obj = obj || window;
  const _this = this;

  return function F(...innerArgs) {
    // \u5224\u65AD\u662F\u5426\u4E3A\u6784\u9020\u51FD\u6570 new
    if (this instanceof F) {
	    return new _this(...args,...innerArg);
    } else {
	    return _this.apply(obj, args.contact(innArgs);
    }
  };
};

  var item = null;

    arr.forEach(function (curItem, i) {
      console.log(i)
      if (curItem.id == id) {
        item = curItem;
        throw Error();
      }
    })
  } catch (e) {}
  return item;
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`//array.reduce(function(total, currentValue, currentIndex, arr), initialValue)

Array.prototype.sx_reduce = function (cb, ...args) {
  let pre,
    start = 0;
  if (args.length) {
    pre = args[0];
  } else {
    pre = this[0];
    start = 1;
  }
  for (let i = start; i < this.length; i++) {
    pre = cb(pre, this[i], i, this);
  }
  return pre;
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`Array.prototype.sx_include = function (value, start = 0) {
  const isnan = Number.isNaN(value);
  for (let i = start; i < this.length; i++) {
    if (this[i] === value || (isnan && Number.isNaN(this[i]))) {
      return true;
    }
  }
  return false;
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`Array.prototype.sx_splice = function (start, length, ...values) {
  if (length === 0) return [];
  length = start + length > this.length - 1 ? this.length - start : length;
  console.log(length);
  const res = [],
    tempArr = [...this];
  for (let i = start; i < start + values.length; i++) {
    this[i] = values[i - start];
  }
  this.length = start + values.length;
  if (values.length < length) {
    const cha = length - values.length;
    for (let i = start + values.length; i < tempArr.length; i++) {
      this[i] = tempArr[i + cha];
    }
    this.length = this.length - cha;
  }
  if (values.length > length) {
    for (let i = start + length; i < tempArr.length; i++) {
      this.push(tempArr[i]);
    }
  }
  for (let i = start; i < start + length; i++) {
    res.push(tempArr[i]);
  }
  return res;
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`String.prototype.sx_slice = function (start = 0, end) {
    start = start < 0 ? this.length + start : start
    end = !end && end !== 0 ? this.length : end

    if (start >= end) return ''
    let str = ''
    for (let i = start; i < end; i++) {
        str += this[i]
    }

    return str
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`String.prototype.sx_substr = function (start = 0, length) {
    if (length < 0) return ''

    start = start < 0 ? this.length + start : start
    length = (!length && length !== 0) || length > this.length - start ? this.length : start + length

    let str = ''
    for (let i = start; i < length; i++) {
        str += this[i]
    }
    return str
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const urlString = 'https://example.com/path/to/resource?param1=value1&param2=value2#hash';

// \u4ECE\u540E\u5F80\u524D\u89E3\u6790
function parseURL(url) {
  const [urlWithoutHash, hash] = url.split('#');
  const [urlWithoutQuery, query] = urlWithoutHash.split('?');
  const [protocol, hostWithPort] = urlWithoutQuery.split('//');
  const [host, port] = hostWithPort.split(':');
  const pathname = urlWithoutQuery.replace(/https?:\\/\\//, '');

  const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(query);

  return {
    protocol,
    host,
    port: port || (protocol === 'https:' ? '443' : '80'),
    pathname,
    search: query,
    hash: \`#\${hash}\`,
    searchParams: Object.fromEntries(searchParams)
  };
